# Introduction
In this analysis, we include visualizations for one simulation from the DSC.

```{r, message = FALSE, warning = FALSE}
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
library(pheatmap)
```

```{r}
source('code/visualization_functions.R')
```

```{r}
data_files <- list.files(path = 'data/adclus_cov_comp_dsc_2k_ex')
```

```{r}
codesymnmf_files <- grep('codesymnmf', 
                         list.files(path ='data/symnmf_cov_comp_dsc_2k_ex'),
                         value = TRUE)
```

# Unbalanced Non-overlapping

```{r}
group_nonoverlap_files <- grep('group_nonoverlap', data_files, value = TRUE)
unbal_nonoverlap_files <- grep('2_', group_nonoverlap_files, value = TRUE)
length(unbal_nonoverlap_files)
```

```{r}
#par(mfrow = c(4, 2))
#par(mar = c(4, 4, 2, 1)) 
for (i in unbal_nonoverlap_files){
  #extract method
  method <- sub("^(?:[^_]*_){3}(.*)_.*$", "\\1", i)
  
  est <- readRDS(paste0('data/adclus_cov_comp_dsc_2k_ex/',i))$est_L
  plot_heatmap(est, title = method, 
               colors_range = c('blue','gray96','red'),
               brks = seq(-max(abs(est)), max(abs(est)), length.out = 50))
}
#par(mfrow = c(1, 1))
```

```{r}
est <- readRDS(paste0('data/symnmf_cov_comp_dsc_2k_ex/', codesymnmf_files[3]))$est_L
plot_heatmap(est, title = 'codesymnmf', 
               colors_range = c('blue','gray96','red'),
               brks = seq(-max(abs(est)), max(abs(est)), length.out = 50))
```
